column4: okay, once in a while when I try to get a game to run and the computer freaks out and crashes the game, ubuntu seems to like going into this weird display mode where all everything becomes huge.  Mind you the desktop has the same proportions, it's just that everything is huge.  Any ideas?
it sounds like the game you're trying to run has a lower resolution than your desktop, and when it crashes, it's not restoring the desktop size
